column5: Beer run on a scissor lift!   http://biggeekdad.com/2010/09/steve-gets-arrested-again/   Tracker (Don)

Well Don... I had two employees that during our company golf tournament, a decade or so ago, took off in the cart from the Brooklea to the Beer Store on Hwy 93. Russ Howard sold them the beer.. then called the police when he saw what they were leaving in. Pulled over on their way back.. impaired operation of a vehicle.. no registration.. no insurance.. theft of cart. Wasn't pretty...
This stuff cant be real...Can it? Anyway enjoy it while you can. Thanks for sharing
http://biggeekdaddy.com/humorpages/Misc/lawnmowerDUItaserarrest.html ".... i think i crap my pants..."  hahaha
I can think of better things for the cops to do.
" i know my rights ! , I know my rights"   lol  I am so glad I never got busted driving those mowers
